title: Thumbelina
short_plot_summary: A tiny girl named Thumbelina goes on a series of adventures, encountering various creatures before ultimately marrying a flower prince.
explanation: A plant seed, signifying Thumbelina's origin, as she was born from a flower
A red-haired girl, representing Thumbelina, the main character of the story
A ring, symbolizing Thumbelina's various marriage proposals throughout her adventures
A frog, illustrating one of the creatures Thumbelina encounters during her journey
A crown, signifying Thumbelina's marriage to the flower prince and her becoming a princess at the end of the story
